Sentencas: Textured cubic yttria stabilized zirconia (Co-YSZ) cermets produced by reduction of laser-assisted directionally solidified CoO-YSZ lamellar eutectics presents a microstructure of alternating lamellae of YSZ and porous metal.
Titulo: Crystallography and thermal stability of textured Co-YSZ cermets from eutectic precursors

Sentencas: This microstructure is expected to improve the gas flow, electronic transport and oxygen ions diffusion of the isotropic cermet.
Titulo: Crystallography and thermal stability of textured Co-YSZ cermets from eutectic precursors

Sentencas: Moreover, the cermet presents long-term stability at fuel cell operating temperatures.
Titulo: Crystallography and thermal stability of textured Co-YSZ cermets from eutectic precursors

Sentencas: The stability of the cermet is related to the lamellar microstructure and to the good metal-ceramic bonding developed after reduction of the CoO-YSZ eutectic.
Titulo: Crystallography and thermal stability of textured Co-YSZ cermets from eutectic precursors

Sentencas: These materials are proposed as cermet anodes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells.
Titulo: Crystallography and thermal stability of textured Co-YSZ cermets from eutectic precursors
